comment.author: Zane
comment.text: I don't want to say it but if it's rigged an she wins what will we do ???

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: I was asking about that today at the gym. No one seems to know. They will probably look to Trump for answers.

replies.author: Zane
replies.text: But I guess that's labeled terrorism
